data.name: Babachenko Oleksandr
data.description: Corresponding Member of the National Academy of Sciences of Ukraine, Doctor of Technical Sciences, Senior Research Fellow
data.researchDirection: Research in the field of ferrous metallurgy, development of new technologies for steel and cast iron production, implementation of energy-saving technologies in metallurgical production.
data.teachingSubjects: "Modeling of complex nonlinear processes in cybersecurity", "Systems theory and control", "Modern information processing methods".
data.biography: Doctor of Technical Sciences (2010), Professor (2018). Graduated from Dnipropetrovsk Mining Institute (1979) with a degree in 'Automation and Telemechanics'. Doctoral dissertation: 'Automated optimal control systems for coarse crushing and self-grinding processes of ores', specialty 05.13.07 'Automation of control processes'. From 2005 worked as an associate professor and professor at the Department of Electronics and Computing, and since 2016 has been working as head of the Department of Information Security and Telecommunications. Certificate of professional development PK02070743/000217 dated 26.06.2020 (NTU 'DP'). CEFR certificate of English proficiency at B2 level (№ 0315401DP71 dated 30.03.2018).
